description: Hotel Accommodations for 30 rooms for 84 nights from June 12 to September 4, 2023BIDS RECEIVED BY EMAIL WILL BE ACCEPTED AS OFFICIAL. BIDS RECEIVED IN-PERSON OR BY COURIER WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca. Bids submitted by email directly to the Contracting Authority or to any email address other than CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca will not be accepted.The maximum email file size that Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)",
